    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers(String name, String facilityId, String message)
      从类复制的说明: Publisher
      This function is used to publish the message to all subscribers (except the publisher)
      指定者:
      notifyObservers 在类中 Publisher
      参数:
      name - the name of the publisher (userName)
      facilityId - the facilityId of the publisher ("workAt(siteId)" field in additionalInfo field of user) if facilityId is null, then the publisher will send the message to all subscribers

    • getNotification

      public void getNotification(String name)
      从类复制的说明: Publisher
      Since our application is console-based We need this function as a helper to get the message that published to the subscribers
      指定者:
      getNotification 在类中 Publisher
      参数:
      name - the message that published to the subscribers
